text.div:
Override Type

Code Description Comment Version
EQV Equivalence Override Identifies an override where a service is being performed against an order that the system does not recognize as equivalent to the ordered service. added v2.5
EXTN Extension Override Identifies an override where a service is being performed for longer than the ordered period of time. added v2.5
INLV Interval Override Identifies an override where a repetition of service is being performed sooner than the ordered frequency. added v2.5

name: v2 Override Type
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0518 ( Override Type)

extension.valueString: Identifies an override where a service is being performed against an order that the system does not recognize as equivalent to the ordered service.
Identifies an override where a service is being performed for longer than the ordered period of time.
Identifies an override where a repetition of service is being performed sooner than the ordered frequency.
